apps.linear.unixPrinter
Class PrintQueue

java.lang.Object
  apps.linear.unixPrinter.PrintQueue

public class PrintQueue
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a printer queue, comprising of Job instances.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal

Field Summary

          List of jobs in this printer queue, stored in a Queue instance

          Initializes this printer queue to empty.

          Queues up a given job at this printer queue.

          Removes the job at the front of his printer queue, provided its owner name matches the given owner name.

Method Detail

lpr

public void lpr(java.lang.String owner,
                int jobId,
                java.lang.String file)
Queues up a given job at this printer queue.

Parameters:
owner - Name of job owner.
jobId - Id of job.
file - Name of file to be printed.

lpq

public void lpq(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
Prints the jobs in this printer queue with a given PrintWriter.

Parameters:
pw - PrintWriter used to print jobs in this queue.

lprm

public void lprm(java.lang.String owner,
                 int jobId)
Removes the job from this printer queue that matches the given owner name and job id.

Parameters:
owner - Name of job owner.
jobId - Job id.
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no matching job exists in this printer queue, or if this queue is empty.

lprm

public void lprm(java.lang.String owner)
Removes the job at the front of his printer queue, provided its owner name matches the given owner name.

Parameters:
owner - Owner name to be matched against the job at the front of this printer queue.
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - If the job at the front does not have a matching owner name to given owner name, or if this queue is empty.

lprmAll

public void lprmAll(java.lang.String owner)
             throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
Removes all jobs in this printer queue whose owner names match with the given owner name.

Parameters:
owner - Owner name to be matched against jobs in this printer queue.
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no job matches the given owner name, or if this queue is empty.
